name: Lalaloopsy
description:
Sew Magical! Sew Cute! With your love and a little bit of imagination, the Lalaloopsy™ magic can go on forever!

Features

• Welcome to the whimsical world of Lalaloopsy! Explore the colorful world and make new friends!
• Friends, Silliness and Fun! Make cookies, grow flowers and more!
• Sew Sweet! Show how much you care for your pets and keep their tummies full with special treats
